div.p:
You were expecting it ? MyModel by
Conexance enables you
to model, from your desktop, the top clients
for your marketing campaigns ! Thanks to
a simple platform
obtain the best of Artificial
Intelligence and Machine Learning
to continuously improve your
targeting

Designed in close collaboration with
Microsoft data experts,
you are just a few clicks away from
a bright future with MyModel
*My modeling

A simplified platform easily accessible from your desk,
with dynamically updated data,
thanks to the contribution
of 600 companies
to model yourself, in one click

With MyModel by Conexance,
you no longer have to wait days to predict the best-performing scenario.
Thanks to artificial intelligence and machine learning,
we offer you the best on demand targeting
in record time!

More profitable and autonomous, MyModel
by Conexance revolutionizes
your CRM campaigns by working
several models at once and using powerful
and self-learning technology.

Faster, more efficient and more economical,
MyModel will help you generate additional growth,
simultaneously freeing up time
for your key operational people.
IN COLLABORATION WITH
